column6: The battle for blood gets thicker as the vampire frenzy comes to a head. With Cap fanged out, Fury brings out the big guns and some new recruits-newish, that is: Perun aka, Russian Thor and the Giant Men. While Blade's ordered to stand down, the new vampire Nerd Hulk has powered up-and it looks like it's going to take a lot more than a few Avengers to avenge these bloodsuckers. Mark Millar and Steve Dillon throw down a vampire tale like none other! 32 PGS./Parental Advisory ...$3.99
